org.apache.spark.sql.hive

Class SQLBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.spark.sql.hive.SQLBuilder

  • public class SQLBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder class used to convert a resolved logical plan into a SQL query string. Note that this all resolved logical plan are convertible. They either don't have corresponding SQL representations (e.g. logical plans that operate on local Scala collections), or are simply not supported by this builder (yet).
